idea:
Fisheria.in is e-commerce fish buying website. Let customer buy fresh fish online.

Fisheria offers the largest assortment of fresh seafood delivery in Mumbai city. We deliver the freshest and cleanest seafood direct to your door and allows you to buy seafood without worrying about quality and services. We have done the work for you. The selection of seafood is carefully done and we offer only the tastiest fresh fish, safest seafood and most sustainable seafood selections. We take pride in providing you with the freshest seafood and we want our customer to be happy. Our seafood is backed by a 100% customer satisfaction guarantee.
name: Fisheria Seafood LLP

idea:
Aham Housing Finance as a company aim to be the institution of choice for fulfilling every individuals housing dream and also to be respected, trusted and renowned for our exceptional customer service in the local community.

We pride ourselves in being at the heart of the communities where we strive to make a real difference. Our presence can be seen mainly in the outskirts of major metros and in smaller cities (Tier II and Tier III). Our uniqueness in combining an interview-based assessment with a proprietary scoring methodology ensures consistency in decision making across all types of people; be it a local trader, a teacher, a government servant or an individual working in a small firm. This allows us to fund higher amounts by taking minimal risks to these individuals who are unable to produce the traditional income proofs.
name: AHAM HOUSING FINANCE PRIVATE LIMITED
